head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths BOORSTEIN, AUERBACH, ELIN ORE

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths BOORSTEIN, AUERBACH, ELIN ORE

block.p: BOORSTEIN - AUERBACH - Elin ore. Beloved mother of Martin and Marilyn, Raymond and Marilyn, Alan and Maxine, and Richard and Connie. Step-mother of Ronnie and Lynn. Grandmother of nine and great-grandmother of three. Services 9 AM, today, at Sinai Chapels, 162-05 Horace Harding Expressway, Fresh Meadows, NY.
